trans-unit.resname: BOT·1 | Prowl, Stoic Strategist | Card Name
BOT·1 | Prowl, Stoic Strategist | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: More Than Meets the Eye {2}{W} (You may cast this card converted for {2}{W}.)
trans-unit.target: 远超所见{2}{W}（你可以施放已转换的此牌，并支付{2}{W}。）

trans-unit.resname: BOT·1 | Prowl, Stoic Strategist | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Prowl attacks, exile up to one other target tapped creature or Vehicle. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may play it.
trans-unit.target: 每当警车攻击时，放逐至多另一个目标已横置的生物或载具。于该牌持续放逐的时段内，其拥有者可以使用之。

trans-unit.resname: BOT·1 | Prowl, Stoic Strategist | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a card exiled with Prowl, you draw a card and convert Prowl.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手使用以警车放逐的牌时，你抓一张牌并转换警车。

trans-unit.resname: BOT·1 | Prowl, Pursuit Vehicle | Card Name
BOT·1 | Prowl, Pursuit Vehicle | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Living metal (As long as it's your turn, this Vehicle is also a creature.)
trans-unit.target: 金属生命体（只要是在你的回合中，此载具便也是生物。）

trans-unit.resname: BOT·1 | Prowl, Pursuit Vehicle | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature or Vehicle enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Prowl. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, convert Prowl.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物或载具在你的操控下进战场时，在警车上放置一个+1/+1指示物。如果这是此异能在本回合第二次的结算，则转换警车。

trans-unit.resname: BOT·2 | Ratchet, Field Medic | Card Name
BOT·2 | Ratchet, Field Medic | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: More Than Meets the Eye {1}{W} (You may cast this card converted for {1}{W}.)
trans-unit.target: 远超所见{1}{W}（你可以施放已转换的此牌，并支付{1}{W}。）

trans-unit.resname: BOT·2 | Ratchet, Field Medic | Card Text: Paragraph 2
BOT·2 | Ratchet, Field Medic | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, you may convert Ratchet. When you do, return target artifact card with mana value less than or equal to the amount of life you gained this turn from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 每当你获得生命时，你可以转换救护车。当你如此作时，将目标法术力值等于或小于你本回合中曾获得生命数量的神器牌从你坟墓场横置移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: BOT·2 | Ratchet, Rescue Racer | Card Name
BOT·2 | Ratchet, Rescue Racer | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Living metal (As long as it's your turn, this Vehicle is also a creature.)
trans-unit.target: 金属生命体（只要是在你的回合中，此载具便也是生物。）

trans-unit.resname: BOT·2 | Ratchet, Rescue Racer | Card Text: Paragraph 2
BOT·2 | Ratchet, Rescue Racer | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more nontoken artifacts you control are put into a graveyard from the battlefield, convert Ratchet. This ability triggers only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个或数个由你操控且非衍生物的神器从战场进入坟墓场时，转换救护车。此异能每回合只会触发一次。

trans-unit.resname: BOT·4 | Blitzwing, Cruel Tormentor | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose flying or indestructible at random. Blitzwing gains that ability until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，随机选择飞行或不灭。闪电获得该异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack, bolster 2. The chosen creature gains trample until end of turn. When that creature deals combat damage to a player this turn, convert Optimus Prime.
trans-unit.target: 每当你攻击时，振励2。所选生物获得践踏异能直到回合结束。本回合中，当该生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，转换擎天柱。

trans-unit.resname: BOT·14 | Soundwave, Sonic Spy | Card Name
BOT·14 | Soundwave, Sonic Spy | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: More Than Meets the Eye {2}{W}{U}{B} (You may cast this card converted for {2}{W}{U}{B}.)
trans-unit.target: 远超所见{2}{W}{U}{B}（你可以施放已转换的此牌，并支付{2}{W}{U}{B}。）

trans-unit.resname: BOT·14 | Soundwave, Sonic Spy | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creature tokens you control deal combat damage to a player, exile target instant or sorcery card with mana value equal to the damage dealt from their graveyard. Copy it. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. If you do, convert Soundwave.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的一个或数个衍生生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，将目标法术力值等同于所造成伤害的瞬间或法术牌从其坟墓场放逐。将其复制。你可以施放该复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。若你如此作，则转换声波。

trans-unit.resname: BOT·14 | Soundwave, Superior Captain | Card Name
BOT·14 | Soundwave, Superior Captain | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a spell with an odd mana value, convert Soundwave. If you do, create Ravage, a legendary 3/3 black Robot artifact creature token with menace and deathtouch.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放法术力值为奇数的咒语时，转换声波。若你如此作，则派出传奇衍生神器生物机器狗，其为3/3黑色，具威慑与死触异能的机器人。

trans-unit.resname: BOT·14 | Soundwave, Superior Captain | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a spell with an even mana value, convert Soundwave. If you do, create Laserbeak, a legendary 2/2 blue Robot artifact creature token with flying and hexproof.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放法术力值为偶数的咒语时，转换声波。若你如此作，则派出传奇衍生神器生物激光鸟，其为2/2蓝色，具飞行与辟邪异能的机器人。

trans-unit.resname: BOT·15 | Ultra Magnus, Tactician | Card Name
BOT·15 | Ultra Magnus, Tactician | Card Text: Paragraph 1

trans-unit.resname: BOT·15 | Ultra Magnus, Tactician | Card Text: Paragraph 2
BOT·15 | Ultra Magnus, Tactician | Card Text: Paragraph 3

trans-unit.target: 每当通天晓攻击时，你可以将一张神器生物牌从你手上横置放进战场，且正进行攻击。若你如此作，则在战斗结束时转换通天晓。

trans-unit.resname: BOT·15 | Ultra Magnus, Armored Carrier | Card Name
BOT·15 | Ultra Magnus, Armored Carrier | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Living metal (As long as it's your turn, this Vehicle is also a creature.)
trans-unit.target: 金属生命体（只要是在你的回合中，此载具便也是生物。）

trans-unit.resname: BOT·15 | Ultra Magnus, Armored Carrier | Card Text: Paragraph 2
BOT·15 | Ultra Magnus, Armored Carrier | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Formidable — Whenever Ultra Magnus attacks, attacking creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. If those creatures have total power 8 or greater, convert Ultra Magnus.
trans-unit.target: 强横～每当通天晓攻击时，由你操控且进行攻击的生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。若这些生物的力量总和等于或大于8，则转换通天晓。

trans-unit.resname: BOT·16 | Prowl, Stoic Strategist | Card Name
BOT·16 | Prowl, Stoic Strategist | Card Text: Paragraph 1
BOT·16 | Prowl, Stoic Strategist | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Prowl attacks, exile up to one other target tapped creature or Vehicle. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may play it.
trans-unit.target: 每当警车攻击时，放逐至多另一个目标已横置的生物或载具。于该牌持续放逐的时段内，其拥有者可以使用之。

trans-unit.resname: BOT·16 | Prowl, Stoic Strategist | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a card exiled with Prowl, you draw a card and convert Prowl.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手使用以警车放逐的牌时，你抓一张牌并转换警车。

trans-unit.resname: BOT·16 | Prowl, Pursuit Vehicle | Card Name
BOT·16 | Prowl, Pursuit Vehicle | Card Text: Paragraph 1
BOT·16 | Prowl, Pursuit Vehicle | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature or Vehicle enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Prowl. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, convert Prowl.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物或载具在你的操控下进战场时，在警车上放置一个+1/+1指示物。如果这是此异能在本回合第二次的结算，则转换警车。

trans-unit.resname: BOT·17 | Ratchet, Field Medic | Card Name
BOT·17 | Ratchet, Field Medic | Card Text: Paragraph 1
BOT·17 | Ratchet, Field Medic | Card Text: Paragraph 2
BOT·17 | Ratchet, Field Medic | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever you gain life, you may convert Ratchet. When you do, return target artifact card with mana value less than or equal to the amount of life you gained this turn from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 每当你获得生命时，你可以转换救护车。当你如此作时，将目标法术力值等于或小于你本回合中曾获得生命数量的神器牌从你坟墓场横置移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: BOT·17 | Ratchet, Rescue Racer | Card Name

BOT·17 | Ratchet, Rescue Racer | Card Text: Paragraph 2
BOT·17 | Ratchet, Rescue Racer | Card Text: Paragraph 3

trans-unit.target: 每当一个或数个由你操控且非衍生物的神器从战场进入坟墓场时，转换救护车。此异能每回合只会触发一次。
